channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From Darwin to Wall Street: Harnessing Evolutionary Theory for Smarter Investments
item.description: Has the science of economics gone astray by borrowing ideas from physics?

item.title: Millennial U.K. lawyers are getting a $50,000 bonus for referring their friends to U.S. giants, despite the inevitable burnout
item.description: U.S. firms have rolled out massive referral bonuses after upping starting salaries to beyond $200,000.

item.title: When it comes to crime, crypto is a powerful tool for law enforcement
